proficiency: Proficiency in a wide range of the latest technologies allows our experts to create custom solutions that fulfill the expectations of our clients in terms of functionality, efficiency and usability
building-solutions: When building solutions, we focus on the real needs of our clients.
depth-of-experience: We rely on the depth of experience and expertise of our specialists.
fund-text: With the aim of further dynamic development of the company and the search for modern solutions, products and services, Nexio Management became the main investor and shareholder in the Platinum Alfa investment fund from January 2019.
about-1a: We are a trusted partner in creating custom-made solutions,
about-1c: to the path of full or partial digitalization and

about-2c: and abroad. We operate based on transparent and honest relations.
about-3a: As a part of our services, we deliver

operate-models: Get to know the business models in which we
business-analysis-text: Conducting a business and system analysis allows for a comprehensive understanding of the company's operations, the identification of relationship between different elements and the improvement of organizational processes. A joint business and system analysis enables the identification of optimal solutions, elimination of inefficiencies and minimization of risks.
architecture-design-text: IT architecture design involves creating an overarching plan for the structure and components of an IT system, considering both technical aspects and business requirements. The process includes identifying the needs and defining the goals of the organization, analyzing the existing IT infrastructure and developing an architectural strategy, with appropriate technologies.
ux-ui-text: UI/UX (user interface/user experience) service involves designing and creating interactive and intuitive interfaces and pleasant experiences for users of applications or websites. It focuses on providing easy navigation, aesthetic design and responsiveness to enhance usability and user satisfaction.
project-management-text: IT project management involves planning, organizing, controlling and coordinating resources and activities to successfully implement IT projects. This includes identifying project goals, managing the schedule, budget and team, monitoring progress and resolving problems.
programming-text: The programming process is a sequence of activities to create software. It begins with analyzing and understanding the requirements, then designing the structure and logic of the program, followed by implementation, that is, writing the code. Once the code is written, it is followed by testing, verification of performance and possible corrections.
env-config-text: Setting up and deploying IT environments is the process of creating and setting up appropriate IT infrastructures for companies or organizations to make IT services work. It includes the installation and configuration of the hardware, software, and tools necessary for the new environment to operate, as well as the testing, deployment, monitoring, and maintenance of the one that is already in place. This process is key to ensuring that IT systems run quickly and efficiently and that reliable services are delivered to end users.
testing-text: Complex IT testing is the process by which full and comprehensive testing of software is carried out to verify its functionality, performance and compliance with requirements. It includes unit, integration, system and acceptance testing to identify bugs, incompatibilities and potential vulnerabilities in the system.
service-text: IT maintenance is ensuring the reliability and performance of the IT infrastructure through monitoring, maintenance, repairs, upgrades, and optimization. IT service is a comprehensive range of technical services including IT support, hardware repair, configuration, network management, data recovery, security, and other IT needs of customers.
business-hero2: of your business with a trusted
look-after-idea: We will look after your idea, improving the digital progress of your company
managed-services: Business approach, in which Nexio takes full responsibility for the provision and management of a specific range of services for the Client
fixed-price: Model often used in case of software development services. Price is set in advance based on specified scope of work. It requires a precise specification of the client’s needs
nearshoring: Comprehensive service for foreign clients, searching for high-quality specialists. Depending on your needs, Nexio can help you build a team (also non IT-competencies) as well as organize the entire office in Poland
advanced-team-leasing: More extensive form of team leasing which offers the client a full team of specialists in terms of technical skills as well as elements of project management and taking responsibility for the final result
team-leasing: By hiring a leasing team, the company uses expertise and skills of our specialists, who are already well-coordinated as a team and have experience in working on similar projects
body-leasing: A strategy that allows companies to quickly use services of our consultants in order to effectively increase ability of implementing projects and achieving business goals

sales-text1: You want to check out our offer?
recruitment-text1: You want to work with us?
lifeplan-app: LifePlan App helps you discover your own potential and strengthen your mental resilience. The app enables you to improve your own work and manage your time and tasks.
opinion-victoriia: At Nexio, I have had and continue to have only wonderful supervisors! During the 2 years of working together, I never felt that I was alone. I know that I can talk to them with any question. For me, as a person who is not from Poland, this support is very important. In addition, I appreciate the atmosphere in the office - there is none of that unnecessary stiffness. I recommend Nexio to people who appreciate a good vibe at work!
opinion-mateusz: As a Java developer, what I appreciate about Nexio is the opportunity to work in the latest versions of this programming language and the fact that I'm up to date with current trends and tools. Additionally, I enjoy the range of projects that include fields such as transportation, insurance, and banking that I have had the opportunity to participate in. Constant cooperation with architects, analysts, designers, and other developers helps me expand the technical aspects of software development and soft skills. As a result, I take part in the entire process of building applications and have the satisfaction of satisfying the customer.
opinion-bohdan: I can describe my experience with Nexio Management as very rewarding - I started as a Senior Xamarin Developer and currently serve as Tech Lead in the Mobile Applications Department. Over the course of my career, I have completed more than six projects, demonstrating my commitment and skills. I am happy to have had the opportunity to develop at Nexio. I have experienced great teamwork here. It has been and continues to be a great journey and I am grateful for the opportunity to be part of such a company.
opinion-jacek: I have been working at Nexio Management for over 7 years, as a .NET Developer. During this time, I have had the opportunity to be part of interesting projects for companies in many different industries. Thanks to the fact that we have numerous clients I think everyone can find a project for themselves in the technologies they like to work in. A big plus is that there's a very friendly atmosphere here. We form a harmonious team, even though the company has grown several times over these 7 years.
testimonial-monika: The implementation of the project - LifePlan App, created in cooperation with Nexio Management sp. z o.o. - went very efficiently in a professional atmosphere. We experienced excellent communication and timeliness. The project team was committed and flexible, adapting to our changing needs and challenges. They were meticulous in understanding our requirements and offered innovative solutions that contributed to achieving the goals we set for the application. We could always count on the professional support of our mentor Project Manager. We are pleased to confirm that Nexio is a trustworthy and professional IT partner and highly recommend their services. Their excellent technical skills, professionalism, and commitment will contribute to the success of any project they are involved with.
testimonial-wieslaw: We are pleased to confirm that Nexio Management has fully met our expectations in the execution of the contract for Contractor's Supply of IT Personnel. The programming, analysis and application testing services were performed with due diligence, on time and in accordance with the contract. We sincerely recommend Nexio as a trustworthy business partner. Thank you for your professional approach to the project!
testimonial-michal: We have been working with Nexio Management since 2021. The services we use as part of the cooperation are related to the maintenance and development of systems and applications that support the operation of our company. The main technology we use as part of the collaboration is .NET. In addition, Nexio is also responsible for database migration, creation and maintenance of a mobile application developed using Xamarin technology. We can confidently confirm that Nexio's employees are distinguished by their high knowledge of dedicated systems and high commitment to the ongoing project. The team that provides the services consists of dozens of people, including, among others: PM, Business and System Analysts, .NET Developers, Testers, BI Developers, UI/UX Designer. We recommend Nexio as a reliable and proven IT service provider.
